title: Marketing Assistant
job_overview:
We are seeking a highly skilled and detail-obsessed Marketing Assistant to support a leading professional services firm with a strong focus on high-quality, polished content. This role requires expertise in video editing, copywriting, and graphic design/branding, ideally with experience supporting law firms or other professional services clients.

The ideal candidate will have exceptional attention to detail. You must take pride in delivering flawless work that aligns with strict brand guidelines and reflects a premium, professional image.

Responsibilities:
Create and edit high-quality video content for social media, websites, and other digital platforms.
Develop strong, persuasive, and engaging copy for various channels (social posts, video scripts, email campaigns, website content).
Design visually compelling graphics and branding materials in line with brand guidelines.
Collaborate with the marketing and leadership teams to conceptualize, plan, and execute content strategies.
Ensure brand consistency across all content and design outputs.
Manage content calendars, schedules, and deadlines with a proactive, organized approach.
Conduct in-depth proofreading and quality checks on all deliverables to ensure precision and accuracy.
Stay up to date with design trends, social media best practices, and industry developments.
Support ongoing content strategy improvements and provide creative ideas to elevate brand presence.
Maintain and manage a digital asset library (videos, images, design files, copy).
Assist with WordPress website updates and content management
Create and manage email marketing campaigns
Support broader marketing strategy planning and execution

Requirements:

Minimum 3â€“5 years of experience in video editing, copywriting, and graphic design for professional services businesses.
Exceptional attention to detail - you must deliver near-perfect work every time.
Proven ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and meet tight deadlines.
Strong portfolio showcasing high-quality video edits, copywriting samples, and design work.
Advanced skills in Adobe Creative Suite (Premiere Pro, After Effects, Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign) and other relevant tools.
Experience with WordPress, including content updates and basic design adjustments
Experience in email marketing, including platform setup, campaign building, and reporting
Ability to contribute to marketing strategy development and collaborate on high-level planning
Excellent written and verbal English communication skills.
Highly organized, self-sufficient, and proactive.
Comfortable working directly with perfectionist clients and adapting quickly to feedback.
Experience working with law firms or professional services clients (highly desirable).
Strong understanding of brand strategy and how to convey brand voice and visual identity.

Software to Be Used:

 Adobe Creative Suite or your preferred editing software
 Your preferred project management system for content management. 
 All social media platforms. 

Time zone: AEST

Working Hours: 4 hours per day / 20 hours per week
